rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0001
rows.name: As expected... NLA's number one team really is something else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0003_02
rows.name:
That brain-headed Grandmaster of
the Growth is terrified of our flesh-and-blood bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0004
rows.name: So, he told me to stall you guys here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Since you are the one holding the [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby],
we had no choice but to come here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Once they destroy the Life, our consciousness operating
these [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby] will vanish too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Afraid? On the contrary, I'm looking forward to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0010
rows.name: Because I'll be liberated from this false life of wandering around like a ghost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even if we are [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby],
we are alive! We aren't fakes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0013
rows.name: No... we died. Back then, along with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0014
rows.name: Sorry, but we don't have the time to enjoy a conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0015
rows.name: If you want to talk, I'll listen, but I am going to attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well then... since you humored me with a conversation,
I suppose I'll humor you with a battle.[ST:wait ]
